text: Absalyamovo (, ) is a rural locality (a village) in Urgalinsky Selsoviet of Belokataysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 244 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == The village is located 55 km from Novobelokatay and 3 km from Urgala. == References == Category:Rural localities in Belokataysky District
title: Absalyamovo, Belokataysky District, Bashkortostan
